name: EcoBottle
overview: Sustainable reusable water bottle company on a mission to eliminate single-use plastic. We create beautifully designed, durable bottles that make choosing sustainability the easiest choice. Every purchase helps fund ocean cleanup initiatives.
targetAudience: Environmentally conscious consumers aged 22-40 who want to reduce their plastic footprint. Active outdoors, health-focused, values transparency and corporate responsibility.

voice.tone: Optimistic, transparent, and action-oriented. We inspire change without guilt-tripping, celebrating every small step toward sustainability.
examples: One bottle. 500 plastic bottles saved per year. Your daily hydration just became planet-positive.
We track every bottle's impactâ€”from the recycled steel it's made from to the ocean cleanup projects your purchase supports.

doStatements: Always include specific impact metrics when possible
Be transparent about materials and supply chain
Connect individual actions to collective impact
dontStatements: Never guilt-trip or shame customers about their choices
Avoid vague environmental claims without data
Don't use 'zero waste' - we're honest that some waste exists
Never greenwash or overstate environmental benefits
